chapters.name: Joining and Establishing
chapters.description: Begin your journey as a new cultivator. Join a sect, learn the basics, and establish your foundation.
chapters.chineseDescription: 开启你的修仙之旅。加入宗门，学习基础，打下根基。
chapters.completionSummary: You have successfully established yourself in the sect. The elders recognize your potential, and new opportunities await.
chapters.chineseCompletionSummary: 你已成功在宗门立足。长老们认可你的潜力，新的机遇正等着你。

chapters.name: Sect Resource Crisis
chapters.description: The sect faces a resource shortage. Multiple paths lie ahead - combat, commerce, or diplomacy.
chapters.chineseDescription: 宗门面临资源短缺。前方有多条道路——战斗、商贸或外交。
chapters.completionSummary: The resource crisis has been resolved through your efforts. Your reputation in the sect has grown significantly.
chapters.chineseCompletionSummary: 资源危机在你的努力下得到解决。你在宗门的声望大幅提升。

chapters.name: Rising Shadows
chapters.description: Dark forces stir in the cultivation world. The sect must prepare for what lies ahead.
chapters.chineseDescription: 黑暗势力在修仙界蠢蠢欲动。宗门必须为即将到来的一切做好准备。
chapters.completionSummary: You have proven yourself against the gathering darkness. Greater challenges await.
chapters.chineseCompletionSummary: 你已证明自己能够对抗聚集的黑暗。更大的挑战在等着你。

nodes.name: First Arrival
nodes.description: You arrive at the sect gates, ready to begin your cultivation journey.
nodes.chineseDescription: 你来到宗门门前，准备开始你的修仙之旅。

dialogue.text: The massive gates of Azure Cloud Sect loom before you, ancient and majestic.
dialogue.chineseText: 青云宗的巨大山门矗立在你面前，古老而庄严。

dialogue.speaker: Gate Guardian
dialogue.text: Halt, traveler. State your purpose.
dialogue.chineseText: 止步，旅人。说明你的来意。

dialogue.text: You explain your desire to join the sect and walk the path of cultivation.
dialogue.chineseText: 你说明了你想加入宗门、踏上修仙之路的意愿。

dialogue.speaker: Gate Guardian
dialogue.text: Very well. Follow me to the registration hall. The entrance examination will test your potential.
dialogue.chineseText: 很好。跟我来登记处。入门考核将测试你的潜力。

nodes.name: Sect Entrance Exam
nodes.description: Take the sect entrance examination to prove your cultivation potential.
nodes.chineseDescription: 参加宗门入门考核，证明你的修炼潜力。

dialogue.speaker: Elder Zhang
dialogue.text: Place your hand on the Spirit Testing Stone. It will reveal your aptitude.
dialogue.chineseText: 把手放在测灵石上。它会显示你的资质。

dialogue.text: The stone glows faintly as spiritual energy flows through you.
dialogue.chineseText: 灵气流过你的身体，石头微微发光。

dialogue.speaker: Elder Zhang
dialogue.text: Acceptable. You show promise, young one. Welcome to Azure Cloud Sect.
dialogue.chineseText: 可以。你有潜力，年轻人。欢迎加入青云宗。

nodes.name: First Assignment
nodes.description: Receive your first assignment from the sect.
nodes.chineseDescription: 从宗门接受你的第一个任务。

dialogue.speaker: Senior Brother Liu
dialogue.text: Junior, the sect has tasks suitable for new disciples. This will help you earn contribution points.
dialogue.chineseText: 师弟，宗门有适合新弟子的任务。这能帮你赚取贡献点。

dialogue.text: You are offered a choice of assignments.
dialogue.chineseText: 你可以选择不同的任务。

choices.text: Gather spirit herbs from the mountain

nodes.name: First Breakthrough Guidance
nodes.description: An elder notices your progress and offers guidance for your first major breakthrough.
nodes.chineseDescription: 一位长老注意到你的进步，为你的第一次重大突破提供指导。

dialogue.speaker: Elder Chen
dialogue.text: Your cultivation has been progressing well. It is time to prepare for the breakthrough to the next stage.
dialogue.chineseText: 你的修炼进展顺利。是时候准备突破到下一阶段了。

dialogue.speaker: Elder Chen
dialogue.text: Remember: stability is key. Do not rush. Let your spiritual energy circulate naturally.
dialogue.chineseText: 记住：稳定是关键。不要急躁。让灵气自然流转。

dialogue.text: Elder Chen teaches you several techniques to stabilize your cultivation base.
dialogue.chineseText: 陈长老教了你几个稳固修为的技巧。

nodes.name: Secret of the Old Library
nodes.description: You discover a hidden passage in the old library. Optional side quest with special rewards.
nodes.chineseDescription: 你在旧藏书阁发现了一条隐藏通道。可选支线任务，有特殊奖励。

dialogue.text: While studying in the old library, you notice a bookshelf that seems slightly different from the others.
dialogue.chineseText: 在旧藏书阁学习时，你注意到有一个书架似乎与其他的不太一样。

dialogue.text: Behind it, a narrow passage leads to a hidden chamber.
dialogue.chineseText: 书架后面，一条狭窄的通道通向一个隐藏的房间。

nodes.name: Resource Shortage Announcement
nodes.description: The sect announces a critical resource shortage. All disciples are called to help.
nodes.chineseDescription: 宗门宣布资源严重短缺。所有弟子都被召集来帮忙。

dialogue.speaker: Sect Leader
dialogue.text: Disciples, our sect faces a grave situation. The spirit mine to the north has been overrun by demonic beasts.
dialogue.chineseText: 弟子们，我们宗门面临严峻形势。北边的灵矿被妖兽占领了。

dialogue.speaker: Sect Leader
dialogue.text: Without these resources, our cultivation pills and formations will soon be depleted. We need every disciple's help.
dialogue.chineseText: 没有这些资源，我们的修炼丹药和阵法很快就会消耗殆尽。我们需要每一位弟子的帮助。

dialogue.text: You sense this is an opportunity to prove yourself and advance in the sect.
dialogue.chineseText: 你感觉这是证明自己、在宗门晋升的机会。

nodes.name: Combat Path - Beast Hunting
nodes.chineseName: 战斗路线 - 狩猎妖兽
nodes.description: Join the combat teams to clear the demonic beasts from the spirit mine.
nodes.chineseDescription: 加入战斗队伍，清除灵矿中的妖兽。

dialogue.speaker: Captain Wang
dialogue.text: We need strong fighters. The beasts are numerous but not particularly powerful. With enough numbers, we can clear them.
dialogue.chineseText: 我们需要强大的战士。妖兽数量众多但不是特别强大。人数够多的话，我们可以清除它们。

dialogue.speaker: Captain Wang
dialogue.text: Those who contribute to the battle will receive combat merit and first pick of the beast materials.
dialogue.chineseText: 参与战斗的人将获得战功和妖兽材料的优先选择权。

nodes.name: Trade Path - Market Investigation
nodes.chineseName: 商贸路线 - 市场调查
nodes.description: Investigate the market to find alternative resource suppliers.
nodes.chineseDescription: 调查市场，寻找其他资源供应商。

dialogue.speaker: Hall Master Qian
dialogue.text: Not all solutions require combat. If we can secure alternative supply routes, the sect can survive this crisis.
dialogue.chineseText: 不是所有解决方案都需要战斗。如果我们能确保其他的供应渠道，宗门可以度过这次危机。

dialogue.speaker: Hall Master Qian
dialogue.text: I need someone with sharp eyes for commerce. The rewards will be... substantial.
dialogue.chineseText: 我需要有商业眼光的人。报酬会...非常丰厚。

nodes.name: Beast Path - Spirit Beast Alliance
nodes.chineseName: 灵兽路线 - 灵兽联盟
nodes.description: Use your connection with spirit beasts to negotiate a peaceful resolution.
nodes.chineseDescription: 利用你与灵兽的联系，谈判和平解决方案。

dialogue.speaker: Elder Mu
dialogue.text: I sense you have an affinity with spirit beasts. The creatures in the mine... they are not truly demonic. They are territorial spirit beasts defending their young.
dialogue.chineseText: 我感觉你与灵兽有缘分。矿中的生物...它们并非真正的妖兽。它们是保护幼崽的领地灵兽。

dialogue.speaker: Elder Mu
dialogue.text: Perhaps... a different approach could work. One that benefits both the sect and the beasts.
dialogue.chineseText: 也许...换一种方式可以奏效。一种对宗门和灵兽都有益的方式。

nodes.name: Crisis Resolution
nodes.description: The crisis reaches its climax. Your chosen path determines the outcome.
nodes.chineseDescription: 危机达到高潮。你选择的道路决定了结果。

dialogue.speaker: Sect Leader
dialogue.text: Thanks to the efforts of disciples like you, the crisis has been averted.
dialogue.chineseText: 多亏了像你这样的弟子的努力，危机已经化解。

dialogue.speaker: Sect Leader
dialogue.text: Your contribution will not be forgotten. The sect rewards those who serve it well.
dialogue.chineseText: 你的贡献不会被遗忘。宗门会奖励那些尽心效力的人。

nodes.name: Hidden Conspiracy
nodes.description: Your investigation reveals something darker behind the resource crisis.
nodes.chineseDescription: 你的调查揭示了资源危机背后更黑暗的东西。

dialogue.text: While reviewing the trade documents, you notice discrepancies that suggest the crisis was not entirely natural...
dialogue.chineseText: 在审查贸易文件时，你注意到一些差异，表明这次危机并非完全是自然发生的...

dialogue.text: So, you've discovered our little secret. How... inconvenient.
dialogue.chineseText: 所以，你发现了我们的小秘密。真是...麻烦。

nodes.name: Ominous Signs
nodes.description: Strange phenomena appear across the cultivation world. The elders are troubled.
nodes.chineseDescription: 奇异现象出现在修仙界各处。长老们忧心忡忡。

dialogue.text: The sky has been darker than usual lately. Even the spiritual energy in the air feels... corrupted.
dialogue.chineseText: 最近天空比平时更暗。甚至空气中的灵气都感觉...被污染了。

dialogue.speaker: Grand Elder
dialogue.text: These signs... I have only read about them in ancient texts. The Demonic Tide approaches.
dialogue.chineseText: 这些迹象...我只在古籍中读到过。魔潮将至。

nodes.name: Preparation Begins
nodes.description: The sect begins preparations for the coming threat. Every disciple must do their part.
nodes.chineseDescription: 宗门开始为即将到来的威胁做准备。每个弟子都必须尽自己的一份力。

dialogue.speaker: Sect Leader
dialogue.text: All disciples will receive additional training. We must be ready.
dialogue.chineseText: 所有弟子将接受额外训练。我们必须做好准备。
